description.translate: A website to connect Peer Supporters to the disabled community

I am originally from the far north and moved with my family to settle in the beautiful Waikato some years ago. Due to an illness, I underwent multiple amputations and have used prosthetic limbs for the past twenty years, I lead a relatively busy life, enjoying my time with family, friends, and assorted fur babies. I have a keen interest in the affairs of the disability community and enjoy working alongside others to achieve a common goal.

children.text: I am originally from the far north and moved with my family to settle in the beautiful Waikato some years ago. Due to an illness, I underwent multiple amputations and have used prosthetic limbs for the past twenty years, I lead a relatively busy life, enjoying my time with family, friends, and assorted fur babies. I have a keen interest in the affairs of the disability community and enjoy working alongside others to achieve a common goal.
My lived experience of impairment is from Bi-lateral below knee Amputee and multiple amputations of fingers.

My areas of interest include: Disabled Persons Assembly, Waikato Amputee Society, the Artificial Limb Service NZ, Volunteering Waikato, Access for All, Waikato DPA, Amputee Federation NZ, Waikato DHB, Disabled Persons Lottery Grants.
My qualifications: Diploma in Hypnotherapy, Diploma in Holistic pulsing, and Cert Bach Flowers
